subject: Basketball (College)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Some men’s basketball programs, like L.S.U.’s and Kentucky’s, are dedicating a preseason practice or two to N.B.A. scouts and gearing them toward their needs.
snippet: Some men’s basketball programs, like L.S.U.’s and Kentucky’s, are dedicating a preseason practice or two to N.B.A. scouts and gearing them toward their needs.
